title: ArumukanukkiNaiyAga
sahitya:
ArumukhanukkaNaiyAga aDiyArin tuNaiyAgip-pAril aruL purivOr vEru yArum illaiyE


anupallavi

  vIra vaDivElai Evi sUranai irukUru sheidu Erum mayil Akkina kAruNya sIruDaiya


caraNam    iDar uTriDuvOr aDi tanadaip-paTri aDaikkam enradum AtkoNDiDuvOn
paDai vIDu Arum tEDi bhaktakOTiyar tanai paNindadum annArai aNaiyum aNNalAm
